short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BetterMaplewood, a browser extension to make your maplewood experience better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
- Integrated GPA/Average calculator
- Modifiable weightings for each course
- Mark overview to display each course's mark directly on the homepage
- Live grade modification to help set mark goals
- Percentage column for markbooks
- Condensed mark UI for easy viewing

https://github.com/youssefsoli/BetterMaplewood

Email me at youssefdevelops@gmail.com for any inquiries.
